tool.name: MRMPairFinder
tool.description: Util which can be used to evaluate labeled pair ratios on MRM features.
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && ln -s '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && mkdir pair_in && ln -s '$pair_in' 'pair_in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $pair_in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($pair_in.ext)' && mkdir out && #if $feature_out_FLAG: mkdir feature_out && #end if
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && export PYTHONPATH='$__tool_directory__/CTDopts/' && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' -pair_in 'pair_in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $pair_in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($pair_in.ext)' -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("consensusxml")}' #if $feature_out_FLAG: -feature_out 'feature_out/output.${gxy2omsext("featurexml")}' #end if
## Postprocessing && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("consensusxml")}' '$out' #if $feature_out_FLAG: && mv 'feature_out/output.${gxy2omsext("featurexml")}' '$feature_out' #end if #if $adv_opts_cond.adv_opts_selector=='advanced' and $adv_opts_cond.ctd_out_FLAG && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.name: in
param.label: Input featureXML file containing the features of the MRM experiment spectra

param.name: pair_in
param.label: Pair-file in the format: prec-m/z-light prec-m/z-heavy frag-m/z-light frag-m/z-heavy rt

param.name: feature_out_FLAG
param.label: Generate output feature_out (Output featureXML file, only written if given, skipped otherwise)

param.name: mass_tolerance
param.label: Precursor mass tolerance which is used for the pair finding and the matching of the given pair m/z values to the features

param.name: RT_tolerance
param.label: Maximal deviation in RT dimension in seconds a feature can have when comparing to the RT values given in the pair file

param.name: RT_pair_tolerance
param.label: Maximal deviation in RT dimension in seconds the two partners of a pair is allowed to have

param.name: test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

tool.help:
Util which can be used to evaluate labeled pair ratios on MRM features.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/documentation/UTILS_MRMPairFinder.html
